title: Polki & Pearl Jadau Choker - Mogra Haaram
materials: Cushion-Cut Aquamarine. Features Hyderabadi Kundan Setting with intricate detailing.
features: This exquisite choker showcases a central, square-shaped Aquamarine gemstone surrounded by a halo of brilliant Polki diamonds set in a traditional Kundan Jadau style. The design incorporates five strands of lustrous freshwater pearls, adding a touch of classic elegance. Mogra-inspired Polki settings accent the pearls and complete the look. Pearl drops enhance the Haaram's gentle movement and captivating sparkle.
occasions: and special festive occasions such as Diwali and Dussehra. Also suited for modern cocktail parties or upscale events.
description: This choker embodies timeless Hyderabadi craftsmanship with genuine Polki diamonds and natural pearls. The Aquamarine adds a modern touch to the traditional Kundan setting. The multi-strand pearl design creates a regal, luxurious look. Its versatility ensures it can be cherished for generations, making it an heirloom piece.
